name: Dice Shot
description:
A short Dungeon Crawler but your health and ammo are decided by the roll of a dice! 
Make it a Nice Shot, will ya? 

Made During: GMTK Game Jam 2022 
Team Game OH:  Aayush(me, cloudy), Vivek Gupta & Ritesh. 

It's a good game, hope you like it :)

Controls: 

WASD/Arrow Keys - to move around
Mouse to Aim,
LMB - Shoot
